name: weiran-agent-skills
description: Weiran Project 的 Agent Skills 集合，提供产品研发流程中的各类专业技能

plugins.name: weiran-eng
plugins.description: 研发流程工具集：BRD 访谈、PRD 撰写/审查/自动化、HLD 撰写/审查。命令：/weiran-eng:brd-interviewer, /weiran-eng:prd-writer, /weiran-eng:prd-reviewer, /weiran-eng:prd-studio, /weiran-eng:hld-writer, /weiran-eng:hld-reviewer

plugins.name: weiran-llm
plugins.description: AI/LLM 工具集：Skill 创建、Prompt 优化。命令：/weiran-llm:skill-creator, /weiran-llm:prompt-optimizer

plugins.name: weiran-mrkt
plugins.description: 营销内容工具集：自媒体文章创作，支持公众号、知乎、小红书、LinkedIn、Medium、Reddit。命令：/weiran-mrkt:media-writer

plugins.name: weiran-bot
plugins.description: weiran 测试平台智能助手（通用版）：测试用例管理、流水线编排、执行监控、故障诊断、CI/CD 集成。兼容 VS Code Copilot、GitHub Copilot 等平台。命令：/weiran-bot:case, /weiran-bot:pipeline, /weiran-bot:tests, /weiran-bot:debug, /weiran-bot:orchestrator, /weiran-bot:workspace
